summary: Overhauls the plain ole Fletcher shop in Solitude and turns it into an actual hunter like shop. Clutter, decorations, and many static items added. Cleaned with TESV Edit.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#38761D][u][b][size=6]A True Solitude's Fletcher[/size][/b][/u][/color]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/aK01TmZ.png?1[/img]

[size=4]A shop overhaul mod.

[color=#6aa84f][u][b][size=5]About this mod:[/size][/b][/u][/color]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/IBjHP16.png?1[/img]

Makes interior changes to the Fletcher shop in Solitude. I found the shop to be bland and decided to change that. This mod adds many new decorative items, "stuffed" animals like a true hunter's shop would display, many static bows (It is a hunting shop after all), some unique decor, and new clutter that actually makes sense.

[b]Bear attack display scene[/b]: When you first enter the shop, you will see the obvious "camp attack" display, which displays a bear and a wolf who stumbled across a poor camper. Luckily this camper has a bow. Anyway, I've seen set ups like this in real life wildlife stores and thought it would work well in Skyrim. IMO, it turned out well and gives the shop a definite camper/hunter feel.

-Cleaned with TESVEdit.


[size=4][color=#6aa84f][u][b][size=5]Requirements:[/size][/b][/u][/color][/size]
[/size]
[color=#ffff00][size=4]Latest Version of Skyrim[/size][/color][color=#ffff00]
[/color]
And that's it!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qkyobgp.png?1[/img]
